entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:53 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 19.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
